episode.title: Vorchheimer v. School Dist. of Philadelphia

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have -- have also the disposition of 76-37, Vorchheimer against the School District of Philadelphia and in that case the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit was affirmed by an equally divided court.
Mr. Justice Rehnquist took no part in the consideration or the decision of the case.
